(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], +2 Attack vs Shields [flail], Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 10F to forge (F2)

This morningstar is enchanted with pure fire for the purpose of destroying undead beings. An undead creature hit by the Holy Scourge will most likely be burned to ashes.
